item.title: A fundamental transformation
item.description:
A fundamental transformation

In 2012, the telecommunications industry became awash with talk of a new and potentially disruptive technology that could herald in a new era of networking. In the months and years since, Software Defined Networking, or SDN, has grown to more than just a buzzword.

item.title: The "Third World" Is Not Your Classroom - The Development Set
item.description:
The "Third World" Is Not Your Classroom - The Development Set

N ot all Americans cause grief within their host organizations. Many make themselves truly useful, while gaining knowledge and perspective in the process. So what makes an experience like this successful and fulfilling for all parties? Clear structure and expectations, I heard, over and over again.

item.title: She's 22, from rural Zimbabwe, and a mogul in the making
item.description:
She's 22, from rural Zimbabwe, and a mogul in the making

Story by Talea Miller. Photos by Brandon Smith. This is part of Kiva's 'Invest in her, invest in change' series celebrating the power of women entrepreneurs around the world. Today only, in honor of International Women's Day. Lindiwe, 22, beams with pride as she presents bottles of her homemade juice and soda to customers at her shop in rural Zimbabwe.

item.title: "Our Biggest Opportunity to Achieve Gender Equality"
item.description:
"Our Biggest Opportunity to Achieve Gender Equality"

Statement on International Women's Day 2016 | 8 March, 2016 Young women today live in a world of immense challenges and serious risks, but also a world of incredible opportunity and expanding possibilities.

item.title: Changing Landscape of Online Shopping in India: Apps Define A New Sweet Spot [REPORT] - Dazeinfo
item.description:
Changing Landscape of Online Shopping in India: Apps Define A New Sweet Spot [REPORT] - Dazeinfo

India, home to a billion people, had finished 2015 with 239 million smartphone users, surpassing even the USA in sheer volume. In a country where smartphones have become the first and in many cases, the only gateway to the Internet, it is interesting to note how the e-commerce industry of India has evolved as smartphone penetration has increased at a steady rate.

item.title: Why Is Android OS Fragmentation in India A Colossal Problem ! - Dazeinfo
item.description:
Why Is Android OS Fragmentation in India A Colossal Problem ! - Dazeinfo

As the Indian smartphone market heads towards a semblance of maturity, we find a growing trend where the smartphone, for a majority of people, has become the first and the only gateway to the Internet. In such a scenario, the software that they use to access the Internet becomes vitally important especially from the standpoint of digital security.

item.title: Apple And Samsung Will Driver the Growth of NFC Mobile Payment In 2016 [REPORT] - Dazeinfo
item.description:
Apple And Samsung Will Driver the Growth of NFC Mobile Payment In 2016 [REPORT] - Dazeinfo

Apple Inc. ( NASDAQ:AAPL) and Samsung Electronics Co Ltd. ( KRX:005930), the two smartphone behemoths, are emerging as the key players to drive the worldwide growth of NFC based mobile payment system in 2016. item.title: Apple Leapfrogs Xiaomi In India's Top 30 Cities Market [REPORT] - Dazeinfo
item.description:
Apple Leapfrogs Xiaomi In India's Top 30 Cities Market [REPORT] - Dazeinfo

Apple Inc. ( NASDAQ: AAPL) may not have found a sizable chunk of the smartphone market in India yet, but the iPhone maker is surely giving sleepless nights to many emerging entrants in the market, i.e Xiaomi.
